transArray.content: I chose this store when I came here for a business trip for the first time. The reviews I read online are quite good. The front desk service is very good and the breakfast is very rich. It is open four hours from 7 to 11 o'clock. It is recommended.

Simple, clear, and powerful! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and giving such a comprehensive review and recognition. Your support is the driving force for our continuous progress. All hotel staff will continue to work hard to provide you with a more comfortable and convenient stay environment. Use our attentiveness to exchange for your comfort when you check in. We look forward to your every visit and wish you a healthy and happy life! General Manager: Li Changxia
